desmoj.core.report

Class AbstractTableFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.report.AbstractTableFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableFormatter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ASCIITableFormatter, HTMLTableFormatter

    public abstract class AbstractTableFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TableFormatter
    A basic implementation of the TableFormatter interface realizing common properties of table formatters.

      • openRow

        public void openRow(Reporter rep)
        Opens a new row. Calls openRow() and saves reference on reporter which will we displayed in that row. Reference on reporter is not necessary for getting content of reporter!!! But maybe its useful for some kind of extended reports.
        Parameters:
        rep - Reporter which will be displayed in new row

      • getReporterForCurrentRow

        protected Reporter getReporterForCurrentRow()
        Returns the reporter which is displayed in current row. Maybe null, if openRow() insted of openRow(Reporter) was called.
        Returns:
        the reporter which is displayed in current row.
